definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: The shadow intermingled with the sunshine.
On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑阴影投影在夜晚一侧的土星环上。

sentences.english: Its shadows are an ambush, its lights a surprise .
sentences.chinese: 它的阴影象伏兵千万，它的光泽令人惊异。

sentences.english: Anne, too, has come out of her shadow.
sentences.chinese: 安妮也走出了姐姐夏洛蒂和艾米莉的阴影。

sentences.english: In the dark pines the wind disentangles itself.
sentences.chinese: 在松树的阴影下，风放开自己。

sentences.english: Shadows on the hills, sketch the trees and the daffodils.
sentences.chinese: 山上的阴影，衬托出树和水仙的轮廓。

sentences.english: Reduce redness by using a green shades.
sentences.chinese: 用绿色打出阴影来掩盖皮肤发红。

sentences.english: This is what the Children of the Shadow do to civilizations who use Protoculture.
sentences.chinese: 这就是阴影之子对使用史前文化的文明所做的一切。

sentences.english: She halted in the shadow of a vat, allowing me to regain my feet and breath.
sentences.chinese: 她停在一个染缸的阴影里，让我匀一匀呼吸和脚步。

sentences.english: Lay thy shadow on the sundials.
sentences.chinese: 把你的阴影投放在日规上。

sentences.english: The slatted window-shade casts a film noir shadow on her.
sentences.chinese: 百叶窗帘在她身上投下朦胧的黑色阴影。

sentences.english: The mountains began to throw their long blue shadow over the valley.
sentences.chinese: 群山已开始在山谷中投下青灰色的阴影。

sentences.english: Shadow disjoin dirty ash into the night…
sentences.chinese: 阴影将肮脏的灰烬分离至夜晚。

sentences.english: Copper sky, shadows rise, bridge of sighs.
sentences.chinese: 红铜色的天空，阴影出现，叹息桥。

sentences.english: Because of this life, her childhood been overshadowed by redness of shadows.
sentences.chinese: 因为这个身世，她的童年被蒙上了血色阴影。

sentences.english: Where dost thou stand behind them all, my lover, hiding thyself in the shadows?
sentences.chinese: 我的情人，你站在大家背后，藏在何处的阴影中呢？

definition: to be deeply in (trouble, debt etc)/deep set (eyes)
